title.rendered: Work schedule for December and January

content.rendered:
Dear customer,
LTL S.p.A. is pleased to present the work schedule for December and January, in
order to improve the order flow/shipment organization at your company.

Thursday, 24th December 2020
Orders will not be shipped due to carriers’ holiday.
Customer assistance will be available until 1 PM due to the early closure.

Friday 25th December 2020
National holiday.

Saturday 26th December 2020
National holiday.

Thursday, 31st December 2020
Orders will not be shipped due to carriers’ holiday.
Customer assistance is available until 1 PM due to the early closure.

Friday, 1st January 2021
National holiday.

Wednesday, 6th January 2021
National holiday.
